Name: G-MODEアーカイブス01 フライハイトクラウディア
About the game: A JRPG whose story takes place in the sky! A scenario-driven, orthodox RPG in the sky world of Claudia. The story begins when Reynas, a knight of the great nation of Kaiserschuld, marches on the neighboring island of Badelsen. In the world of Claudia, she travels between floating islands scattered in a sea of clouds while controlling an airship, and a dramatic scenario with a variety of events unfolds. A unique battle system (Multi-Weight Battle) that can be easily controlled provides a sense of speed and exhilarating action at the same time. You can enjoy powerful battle scenes with magic and special moves full of effects. ■ About G-MODE Archives The G-MODE Archives is a reissue project that faithfully recreates old feature phone games as they were back then. In order to enjoy the app as it was back then, the web-connected menu, buttons, and keys have been transplanted, but some of them may not work. For more information on the Steam version, press START button and see the 'How to play' in the PAUSE menu.
